title: Lord Chaitanya transforms the heart of Chand Kazi | Sri Sampati Dasa
speaker: HG Jai Chaitanya Dasa

segments.text: Nadia district where Navadvip is located was under the jurisdiction of Chand Kazi who worked
under Nawab Hussain Shah under the Kazi's order his soldiers disrupted Sankirtana congregational
chanting of the Lord's holy names on the streets of Navadvip interestingly Lord Chaitanya then
conducted the very first civil disobedience movement attended by thousands of devotees
to protest the order of the Kazi and the actions of his soldiers
by seeing that big gathering Chand Kazi got scared and he hid in the home somehow Chaitanya
Mahaprabhu convinced Chand Kazi to come out and had a debate
with him and transformed his heart in this way Chand Kazi became a great Vaishnava it is because
it is a result of hearing from Lord Chaitanya Shravanam the process of Shravanam is so powerful
Krishna Raj Kaviraj Goswami says this Shravanam process can immediately awaken Krishna Prema
hearing Krishna katha directly from Krishna reading from Bhagavad Gita Bhagavatam even we can awaken our Krishna Prema within our hearts
